```{r}

load('data/fig_5/EffectsAllForRuben.Rimage')

plot3DA<-plot3DA+labs(x=NULL,y=NULL)+ggtitle('Days to anthesis')

DAdata <- ggplot_build(plot3DA)
DAdata <- DAdata$data[[1]]

plot3PH<-plot3PH+labs(x=NULL,y=NULL)+ggtitle('Plant height')
plot3ASI<-plot3ASI+labs(x=NULL,y=NULL)+ggtitle('Anthesis silking interval')
plot3FW<-plot3FW+labs(x=NULL,y=NULL)+ggtitle('Field weight')
plot3BCW<-plot3BCW+labs(x=NULL,y=NULL)+ggtitle('Bare cob weight')
plot3GWH<-plot3GWH+labs(x=NULL,y=NULL)+ggtitle('Grain weight per hectare')
plotG<-plot_grid(plot3DA,plot3PH,plot3ASI,plot3FW,plot3BCW,plot3GWH,nrow=2)
y.grob <- textGrob("Effect of the highland allele", 
                   gp=gpar(fontface="bold", col="black", fontsize=15), rot=90)
x.grob <- textGrob("Elevation (m)", 
                   gp=gpar(fontface="bold", col="black", fontsize=15))
#add to plot
Gplot<-grid.arrange(arrangeGrob(plotG, left = y.grob, bottom = x.grob))
ggsave(Gplot,device = 'png',filename = 'EffectsForRuben.png',width=8,height=8,dpi=200)

```
